cocktails.name: 9 To 5
cocktails.instructions: Stir and strain into cocktail glass with cubed ice. Express with a lemon peel and discard. Garnish with apple slices.

cocktails.name: Dumb Blond
cocktails.instructions: Shake and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with lavender sprig.

cocktails.name: Pinfire
cocktails.instructions: Pre-heat a goblet, then build in glass. Top with 5oz hot water, garnish with a lemon twist and jasmine pearls.

cocktails.name: Boil Over
cocktails.instructions: Pre-heat a goblet, then build in glass. Add two oz heavy cream to a shaker tin with 0.25 cinnamon syrup, shake for 10 seconds to whip, then float on top of drink. Garnish with grated nutmeg and a mint leaf.

cocktails.name: Slick Heel
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into a chilled rocks glass with no ice. Garnish with an orange zest.

cocktails.name: Destroying Angel
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into an old fashioned glass over large cubes. Garnish with a rosemary sprig

cocktails.name: Express Rider
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into an old fashioned glass over large cubes. Garnish with a blood orange.

cocktails.name: Half-cocked
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into an old fashioned glass over large cubes. Garnish with an apricot.

cocktails.name: One-eyed Jack
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients but porter to a mixing glass with ice, stir, strain into a small mason jar over large ice cubes. Add porter to a cocktail shaker and shake, then top cocktail with foam. Garnish with coffee beans.

cocktails.name: Matsumoto
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker except yuzu soda. Shake with ice double-strain into a collins glass. Add pebble ice and top with yuzu soda. Garnish with thai basil.

cocktails.name: Della Rose
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker except prosecco and soda. Shake with ice double-strain into a wine glass. Add soda and prosecco and garnish with a blood orange.

cocktails.name: Hoedown
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice, shake, strain into an old fashioned glass over large ice cubes. Garnish with a piece of candied ginger.

cocktails.name: Comanche
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice, shake, double strain into a coupe. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Lickety Split
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to cocktail shaker with ice, shake, strain into an old fashioned glass over large ice cubes. Garnish with a pineapple wedge.

cocktails.name: Gypsy Queen
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Moscow Mule
cocktails.instructions: Fill an old fashioned glass with chip ice. Pour ingredients into old fashioned glass and garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Tommy Knocker
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients into a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain with a julep strainer into an old fashioned glass over cube ice. Garnish with an orange and lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Modern Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: Muddle orange slice, simple syrup, and bitters in an old fashioned glass. Add double rye and high west bourbon. Add cube ice  and stir in the glass until chilled. Garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Toronto
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in mixing glass with cube ice and stir until diluted. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with orange twist.

cocktails.name: Old Pal
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in mixing glass with cube ice and stir until diluted. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with an orange twist.

cocktails.name: Hot Toddy
cocktails.instructions: Muddle 2 lemon slices in a goblet. Add all other ingredients and stir in the glass. Garnish with a cinnamon stick.

cocktails.name: Lion's Tail
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Brown Derby
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in cocktail shaker and shake with ice until chilled. Serve up in a chilled martini glass and garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Brooklyn
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until chilled. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with brandied cherries.

ingredients.name: Amer Picon Or - 2 Dashes Of Angostura Bitters

cocktails.name: Whiskey Collins
cocktails.instructions: Combine all ingredients except soda water in a shaker with cube ice and shake until chilled. Strain into collins glass over cube ice. Top with soda and garnish with brandied cherries.
cocktails.garnish: Soda and garnish with brandied cherries

cocktails.name: Mint Julep
cocktails.instructions: Muddle 4 -5 mint leaves in 0.5 oz simple syrup. Add rendezvous rye, fill glass with crushed (or shaved ice), and stir. Garnish with fresh mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Mountain Julep
cocktails.instructions: In a shaker, muddle lemon wedge, mint leaves and simple syrup together. Add rendezvous rye and ice. Shake until chilled and strain into a rocks glass filled with crushed ice. Garnish with a mint sprig and lemon wedge.

cocktails.name: Little Italy
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into chilled cocktail glass and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Penicillin
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in a shaker with cubed ice and shake vigorously. Strain into a rocks glass over cubed ice and add peated scotch float. Garnish with candied ginger.

cocktails.name: Boulevardier
cocktails.instructions: Lemon twist garnishcombine all ingredients in a mixing glass with cubed ice and stir until chilled. Serve up or over cubed ice in a rocks glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.watch a tutorial

cocktails.name: Sazerac
cocktails.instructions: Absinthe rinse a rocks glass. Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir until chilled. Strain into a rocks glass up or over ice. Garnish with a flamed lemon peel.

cocktails.name: Poncho And Lefty
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice, stir for 10 seconds. Strain into an old fashioned glass over cubed ice. Garnish with an orange peel.

cocktails.name: Devil's Eye
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin and dry shake for 10 seconds without ice. Add ice, shake vigorously until chilled, double strain into an 8oz mason jar or nick and nora glass. Express orange peel over the drink before serving.

ingredients.name: Lemon Juice Dash Saline Solution (5:1) Add All Ingredients To Shaker Tin With Ice , Shake Well , Double Strain Into 16 Mason Jar Over Swizzle Ice , Garnish With A Pineapple Wedge

cocktails.name: Highwayman's Pardon
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin with ice, shake well, double strain into an old fashioned glass over cubed ice. Garnish with blackberries.

cocktails.name: Horse's Neck
cocktails.instructions: Fill an old fashioned glass with chip ice. Pour all ingredients into the glass. Garnish with a lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Vieux Carre
cocktails.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with cube ice and stir until diluted. Strain into an old fashioned glass over cube ice and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Manhattan
cocktails.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir until chilled. Strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with brandied cherries.

cocktails.name: Old Fashioned Old Fashioned
cocktails.instructions: Combine ingredients in a rocks glass with cubed ice and stir until chilled. Garnish with orange and lemon twist.

cocktails.name: Dead Man's Boots
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients except ginger beer in a cocktail shaker. Add chip ice, shake, strain over ice, and top with ginger beer. Garnish with a lime wedge.

cocktails.name: Forty Drops
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients to shaker tin with ice, shake well, double strain into a coupe glass. Garnish with a lime wheel.

cocktails.name: Heyduke
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients but prosecco and soda to a shaker tin with ice, short shake, double strain into a wine glass. Add prosecco and soda, then ice. Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Prospector's Elixir
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients but soda to shaker tin with ice, short shake, strain into a collins glass over swizzle ice. Top with soda, garnish with a lemon wheel.

cocktails.name: Alta Ruby
cocktails.instructions: Add all ingredients but prosecco and soda to a shaker tin with ice, short shake, double strain into a wine glass. Add prosecco and soda, then ice. Garnish with a strawberry.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Lemonade
cocktails.instructions:
There are three steps to this cocktail. Yield: 1.5 qt (or 6 qts finished lemonade: enough for 40 cocktails!) Step 1: the spiced syrup
5 cups sugar
4 cups water
2 lemons
18-20 whole cloves
4 cinnamon sticks
1 vanilla bean
1 whole nutmeg
cut the lemons into halves
put all the ingredients together in a pot and make sure to mix it well, so it doesnt burn on the bottom
when the syrup starts to boil, lower the heat and simmer for 45 mins
strain the syrup and cool in a separate container
step 2: the lemonade
mix together the following:
1 cup high west spiced syrup
1 cup fresh lemon juice (approx. 6-8 lemons)
1 1/2 cup water
step 3: the cocktail
1.5 oz high west double rye
4 - 5 oz lemonade
mint sprig garnish
in a rocks glass add 1.5 oz of high west double rye then fill with high west lemonade and add ice. Garnish with a fresh mint sprig.

cocktails.name: Whiskey Sour
cocktails.instructions: Chill a martini glass. Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker with ice and shake until chilled. Strain back into the cocktail shaker and shake again with no ice (reverse dry shake). Double strain into a chilled martini glass. Garnish with angostura bitters and brandied cherries.
